00063 
00064 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00065 {
00066     DataBase db;
00067     QApplication app(argc, argv);
00068     QTranslator*  qtt = new QTranslator ( 0 );
00069     QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00070 
00071     QString i18nPath;
00072        i18nPath.clear();
00073        i18nPath.append(APP_PREF);
00074        i18nPath.append("/share/");
00075        i18nPath.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00076        i18nPath.append("/i18n");
00077 
00078 
00079     // Getting env LANG variable
00080     QString lang;
00081     settings.beginGroup("app");
00082        lang = settings.value("lang").toString();
00083     settings.endGroup();
00084 
00085     // This is hack for next QLocale bug:
00086     //  http://bugs.gentoo.org/150745
00087 
00088     if (lang.isEmpty()){
00089         lang = setlocale(LC_ALL, "");
00090           if (lang.isEmpty()){
00091             lang = setlocale(LC_MESSAGES, "");
00092                 if (lang.isEmpty()){
00093                  lang = getenv("LANG");
00094                 }
00095           }
00096         lang = lang.split(".").at(0).toLower();
00097         lang.append(".qm");
00098     }
00099 
00100     if (!lang.isNull()){
00101        if (qtt->load(lang, i18nPath)){
00102         app.installTranslator( qtt );
00103        } else {
00104         qDebug()<<"[EE] Can't open user selected translation";
00105         if (qtt->load("en_us.qm", i18nPath)){
00106            app.installTranslator( qtt );
00107         } else {
00108            qDebug()<<"[EE] Can't open default translation, fall back to native translation ;[";
00109         }
00110        }
00111     } else {
00112        qDebug()<<"[EE] Can't get LANG variable, fall back to native translation ;[";
00113     }
00114 
00115     /* ============================================= *\
00116      This is back support test for v <=0.100
00117      plz remove it on v0.120
00118        --------------------------------------------- */
00119 
00120     QDir dir;
00121     QString rootConfPath;
00122        rootConfPath.append(QDir::homePath());
00123        rootConfPath.append("/.q4wine/");
00124 
00125     if (dir.exists(rootConfPath)){
00126        QMessageBox::warning(0, QObject::tr("Version outdated"), QObject::tr("Sorry, new wersion of q4wine require new files location.<br><br>You must manually delete all old files at:<br>$HOME/.q4wine<br>$HOME/.config/Brezerk\\ GNU\\ Soft<br><br>Note: new files location is:<br>~/.config/q4wine"));
00127        return -1;
00128     }
00129 
00130     /* ============================================== */
00131 
00132     /* ============================================= *\
00133      This is back support test for v <=0.110
00134      plz remove it on v0.120
00135        --------------------------------------------- */
00136 
00137     rootConfPath.clear();
00138     rootConfPath.append(QDir::homePath());
00139     rootConfPath.append("/.config/Brezerk GNU Soft");
00140 
00141     if (dir.exists(rootConfPath)){
00142         QMessageBox::warning(0, QObject::tr("Version outdated"), QObject::tr("Sorry, new wersion of q4wine require new files location.<br><br>You must manually delete all old files at:<br>$HOME/.q4wine<br>$HOME/.config/Brezerk\\ GNU\\ Soft<br><br>Note: new files location is:<br>~/.config/q4wine"));
00143         return -1;
00144     }
00145 
00146     /* ============================================= */
00147 
00148     if (!settings.contains ("configure")){
00149        //If no key, we gona to start an First Run Wizard to setup q4wine
00150        Wizard *firstSetupWizard = new Wizard(1);
00151        if (firstSetupWizard->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
00152 
00153             rootConfPath.clear();
00154             rootConfPath.append(QDir::homePath());
00155             rootConfPath.append("/.config/");
00156             rootConfPath.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00157 
00158             // Creating root folder
00159             if (!dir.exists(rootConfPath)){
00160                if (!dir.mkdir(rootConfPath)){
00161                 QMessageBox::warning(0, QObject::tr("Error"), QObject::tr("[EE] Unable to create root directory %1.").arg(rootConfPath));
00162                 return -1;
00163                }
00164             }
00165 
00166             // Creating sub folders
00167             QStringList subDirs;
00168             subDirs << "db" << "icons" << "prefixes" << "tmp" << "theme";
00169 
00170             QString subDir;
00171 
00172             for (int i=0; i<subDirs.size(); ++i){
00173                subDir=rootConfPath;
00174                subDir.append("/");
00175                subDir.append(subDirs.at(i).toLocal8Bit().constData());
00176                if (!dir.exists(subDir)){
00177                 if (!dir.mkdir(subDir)){
00178                    QMessageBox::warning(0, QObject::tr("Error"), QObject::tr("[EE] Unable to create directory %1.").arg(subDir));
00179                    return -1;
00180                 }
00181                }
00182             }
00183 
00184             settings.setValue("configure", "yes");
00185         } else {
00186             return -1;
00187         }
00188     }
00189 
00190     if (!initDb())
00191        return -1;
00192 
00193     QStringList tables;
00194     tables << "prefix" << "dir" << "icon" << "images";
00195     if (!db.checkDb(tables))
00196        return -1;
00197     MainWindow mainWin;
00198     mainWin.show();
00199     int result = app.exec();
00200     db.close();
00201 
00202     return result;
00203 }
